ComicInfo.Summary:
The Princess and the Frog
In a small town in South Carolina something evil stalks the night taking a reptilian form. The legend of the Lizard Man is well known to the locals and these tales bring Skye to town to solve the mystery. But the truth she finds behind the legend may be more than her powers as the new guardian can overcome. Grimm fairy tales presents a brand new take of the classic fairy tale the Princess and the Frog.
